summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TechGalaxy e-commerce platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has React Select component errors preventing full UI testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Runtime errors: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
ui_bugs.details: Select components are causing uncaught runtime errors preventing proper page loading

integration_issues.issue: Page fails to load due to Select component errors
Cannot test cart functionality due to products page errors

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix React Select component implementation - all Select components need proper value props. This is blocking products page, cart functionality, and checkout flow. The Select components are throwing runtime errors that prevent page loading.

success_percentage.frontend: 40% (basic navigation works, but Select errors block major functionality)
